item.title: What is the Recapture Provision? I am not familiar with it.
item.description: Several clients have inquired about the recapture provision in the extended payroll tax cut. This provision mandates a 6.2% tax on earnings exceeding a certain limit within the year’s first two months. The question arises: how is this implemented? Fortunately, Terry Heley from Microsoft has written an informative blog post clarifying this provision and explaining why it’s not handled within GP. http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dynamicsgp/archive/2012/01/05/payroll-tax-cut-temporarily-extended-into-2012-translated-so-a-user-can-understand-and-how-it-affects-microsoft-dynamics-gp.aspx Take a look! Christina Phillips is a Microsoft Certified Trainer and Dynamics GP Certified Professional.
